flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
This ball shaped lamp are quite durable and hardy.

You can dispose it in your bedroom, living room, dinning room, courtyard or any other place you want to decorate.

Durable for indoor and outdoor decoration, making your party and house more vidid and warm if decorate with these lovely LED fairy lights .

For more information please check

http://www.pandawill.com/wedding-christm...
